title: 2 Nami classic skins??
body: Just wondering why nami has 2 classic skins?

replies.body:
Hiya lucv! 

This is a known issue that we've been working to resolve.
And Vel'Koz. Just so you know.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=WGjKV4EY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-12T20:46:59.671+0000)
>
> Hiya lucv! 
> 
> This is a known issue that we've been working to resolve.

This is also a problem with Corki. He has two classic skins as well.
